directions: Mix first 8 ingredients in large glass pitcher; stir until well blended. Refrigerate 2 hours to allow flavors to blend. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Keep refrigerated.)
Fill 8 tall glasses with ice cubes. Pour punch over. Garnish each glass with orange slice and serve.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Grand Marnier or other orange liqueur
title: Cranberry-Vodka Punch
